endpoints.description: Run a single prediction on the model

parameters.name: image

param_schema.title: Image
param_schema.description: The input image file to be upscaled.

parameters.description: The input image file to be upscaled.

parameters.name: scale_factor

param_schema.description: The factor by which to upscale the image (2, 4, 8, 16, or 32).

parameters.description: The factor by which to upscale the image (2, 4, 8, 16, or 32).

parameters.name: max_batch_size

param_schema.title: Max Batch Size
param_schema.description: Controls the number of image tiles processed simultaneously. Higher values may increase speed but require more GPU memory. Lower values use less memory but may increase processing time. Default is 1 for broad compatibility. Adjust based on your GPU capabilities for optimal performance.

parameters.description: Controls the number of image tiles processed simultaneously. Higher values may increase speed but require more GPU memory. Lower values use less memory but may increase processing time. Default is 1 for broad compatibility. Adjust based on your GPU capabilities for optimal performance.
